Articles.Content:
I MADE A SHIP! picture! - -Download- http://www./view/iu2kldnl0p3rl7e/Falcon_MK2.craft

This has 81 parts, and be very careful, activate SAS everytime you yaw pitch or roll. (after it) SO MANY CONTROL SURFACES!
Does it have a function or is it just fun to fly ?

It's fun to fly, but you can use it for traveling to different continents, and if you feel like doing so, you can replace the fuel tanks and engines with liquid fuel engines and add a few rcs ports and go to the mun!
By the way, if it spins out, DO NOT TRY TO SAVE IT. Immediatley activate the parachutes. (also before launch make a seperate stage for the parachutes)
